Class TicTacToeWindow

java.lang.Object

                      game.TicTacToeWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class TicTacToeWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Main window for tic tac toe. This will handle all the user interfaces and interactions.

Author:
Mark

public void reset()
This is a handler for outside classes such as a wincondition checker, it allows easy resetting of the board.

getState

public int getState(int x,
                    int y)
returns the state of the x,y "grid" remember, both and y should be between 0 and 2 inclusive a value of 0 means the piece is not used a value of 1 means it is used by player 1 a value of 2 means it is used by player 2

Parameters:
x -
y -
Returns:

set the state of a grid location remember, both x and y should be between 0 and 2 inclusive remember, player should be one or two for state values a value of 0 means it is not used a value of 1 means it is used by player 1 a value of 2 means it is used by player 2
